name: Let Autumn Fall
description:
Let Autumn Fall is a simple text-based narrative game made using Twine. The game is about a young girl named Autumn as she navigates the challenges that come with parents who have decided to divorce. The game takes place in Autumn's subconscious, as she explores the fictional world of Varaland while internalizing her emotions. The game has two endings.

This project was made in one month

Designed by: Sasha Tschernisch (@SashaTschernisch on itch.io)
